channel.title: How to make npc's talk?
channel.description:
Hey guys, my friend and I needs a little help here. We are trying to make some npc's talk. But everytime we compile, we get an error. Now, we place this in dialogue.java
case 1: c.npc("Hey there, nice day isn't it?", 1); break;
We are using richscape source, witch is a 503.. So if any of you knows how to fix this. Could you please reply as soon as possible. Thanks in advance.
~ Macoronizer.

item.title: How to make npc's talk?
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Hey guys, my friend and I needs a little help here. We are trying to make some npc’s talk. But everytime we compile, we get an error. Now, we place this in dialogue.java

case 1:
c.npc(“Hey there, nice day isn’t it?”, 1);
break;

We are using richscape source, witch is a 503… So if any of you knows how to fix this. Could you please reply as soon as possible.
Thanks in advance.

~ Macoronizer.
